question:
Arrange the following Buddhist councils in a chronological order
(1) Vaishali
(2) Rajagraha
(3) Patliputra
(4) Sreenagar
explanation:
First Buddhist Council :It was held soon after the Mahaparinirvan of the Buddha, around 483 BC under the patronage of King Ajatshatru.
Second Buddhist Council: The Second Buddhist Council was held at Vaisali.
Third Buddhist Council: It was held in 250 BC at Pataliputra under the patronage of King Asoka.
Fourth Buddhist Council: The fourth Buddhist council was held in 72 AD at Kundalvana, Kashmir.
